question: I have to do the teacher register and inform the management. Does this constitute Ghibah?
answer:
QUESTION

 

plz tell me if i am in a post where i have to check the teachers r going on time or not if not i have to inform higher management is it ghibat

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful  


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

May Allah Taa`la keep you steadfast in refraining from Gheebat.

 

It is permissible for you to inform the management about the times of the teachers.

 

The task of informing the management about the times of the teachers has been entrusted to you; not doing so will be breach of trust.

When Gheebat is done in order to rectify some evil and the matter is discussed with a person who is in position to rectify that evil then it will be permissible.

 (Riyadus Saliheen Pg, 538, Idara)
(Aldurarul mubaha fil hazri wal ibaaha,  pg 175, Ilmiya Damascus)[1]

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best

Wassalāmu ῾alaykum

 

Ml. Muhammed Sindhi,
Student Dārul Iftā

 

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Dārul Iftā




[1]  اعلم ان الغيبة تباح لغرض صحيح شرعي, ولا يمكن الوصول اليه الا بها.... و هو..الاستغاثة علي تغيير المنكر و رد
     العاصي الي الصواب, فيقول لمن يرجو قدرته علي ازالة المنكر: فلان يعمل كذا  فان لم يقصد ذالك كان حراما. (الدرر المباحة في الحظر و الا باحة  باب التاسع و الخمسون , باب الغيبة)
